snippet: Officials say Sahar Gul’s mother-in-law, sister-in-law and father-in-law locked her in a basement for months and tortured her after she refused to go into prostitution.
abstract: Torture of young Afghan girl Sahar Gul by her husband's family for refusing to go into prostitution causes sensation in Afghanistan, underscoring the unfinished business of advancing women's rights there.

byline.contributor: Jawad Sukhanyar and Sharifullah Sahak contributed reporting.

lead_paragraph: Officials say Sahar Gul’s mother-in-law, sister-in-law and father-in-law locked her in a basement for months and tortured her after she refused to go into prostitution.

headline.seo: 2 Arrested in Torture of Afghan Girl
headline.main: 3 In-Laws of Afghan Girl, 15, Are Held in Her Torture
headline.print_headline: 3 In-Laws Are Held in Torture of Afghan Girl, 15
